name: Gothitelle
author: Mousho
flavor_text: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

abilities.name: Distorted Future
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may have your opponent shuffle their hand into their deck and draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Synchro Shot
attacks.effect: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 90 more damage.
